content.question: Over the course of the twentieth century, standardized French became more prevalent, and most of the dialects represented on the map became much less widely spoken. Of the following, which contributed most strongly to these developments?

choices.label: The spread of mass communication technology, such as television and radio
European Union regulations concerning officially recognized languages
Migration of guest workers into France

content.answer: The spread of mass communication technology, such as television and radio
